donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Malaria Control Programme - Round 2 Global Fund grant to reduce the burden of malaria in the beneficiary population of Bahr el Ghazal, Equatoria and Upper Nile Regions of Southern Sudan, through increased use of long lasting insecticide treated bed nets; expansion of intermittent presumptive malaria treatment for pregnant women; improved early diagnosis and treatment of malaria at the community level and health facility level; and strengthen local capacity to detect and contain malaria.

project_descr: Malaria Control Programme in South Sudan - The Global Fund Round 2 grant was designed to reduce the burden of malaria disease in South Sudan with a focus on children under five years and pregnant women
